title: Mouse 4 & 5 buttons not working
body: After the latest update to windows my side mouse buttons are not working, I've tried looking around for solutions and checked device manager like others have done but nothing is working. I can select the buttons on the client options in the top right and it responds but while in game it acts like i never hit the buttons. Anyone know of any other fixes?

replies.body: There's been an issue with the Creator update for some players, which has disabled those buttons from working in-game.  Your best bet for now would be roll back the update, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well to investigate further and see if we can find options.
Thank you! going back to before the update fixed my issue {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I am having this issue as well Riot, how do you complete a update rollback to ensure I can use my mouse keys in game?

thanks
